templates.name: task Template
templates.value:
Create a page for updating email templates.

  1. The user will have a Template dropdown containing at least two templates.

  2. When the user selects a template, its design/preview should be displayed below.

  3. An Edit icon should be available.
     * When the user clicks the Edit icon, the UI should switch to an HTML editor box where the template content can be edited or updated.
     * A Save button should appear at the bottom.

  4. After the user updates the template and clicks Save, the editor should close and the template preview should appear again in place of the HTML editor.

templates.name: Day-1 Template
templates.value:
Create a page for updating email templates.

  • The user will have a Template dropdown containing at least two templates.

  • When the user selects a template, its design/preview should be displayed below.

  • An Edit icon should be available.
     * When the user clicks the Edit icon, the UI should switch to an HTML editor box where the template content can be edited or updated.
     * A Save button should appear at the bottom.

  • After the user updates the template and clicks Save, the editor should close and the template preview should appear again in place of the HTML editor.
